record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1905, Champions of the West. Fifth row: Fred Mitchell Walker, Leo Carter DeTray, Merrill Church Meigs, William James Boone, and Melville Archibald "Bubbles" Hill; fourth row: Frederick Adolph Speik; third row: Gerry Williamson, Lewis Daniel Scherer, Edwin Eugene Parry, Lester Lamont Larson, and Clarence Russell; second row: H. B. Conibear (trainer), Carl Huntley Hitchcock, Mark Seavey Catlin (captain), Jesse Claire Harper, and Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach); first row: Arthur Hill Badenoch, Hugo Frank Bezdek, Walter Herbert Eckersall, and Burton Pike Gale.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: 35 mm negative with contact print on file. Mounted on board. Captions in pieces in mylar.
